case_title: Chief Land Commissioner ALI MUHAMMAD and others vs Mst. SALEH KHATOON and another
appellant: Chief Land Commissioner ALI MUHAMMAD and others

key_points.tenant_complaints: Concealing holding and violating Land Reforms Regulation, 1972

judgment_summary.land_commissioner_decision: Endorsed Deputy Land Commissioner orders dated 8-5-1979 and 15-5-1979
judgment_summary.final_decision: No grounds to interfere with impugned orders
